params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.label_detection_mode
params.description: What labels should be detected with LABEL_DETECTION, in addition to video-level labels or segment-level labels. If unspecified, defaults to SHOT_MODE.

params.name: data.stationary_camera
params.description: Whether the video has been shot from a stationary (i.e. non-moving) camera. When set to true, might improve detection accuracy for moving objects. Should be used with SHOT_AND_FRAME_MODE enabled.

params.name: data.model
params.description: Model to use for label detection. Supported values: "builtin/stable" (the default if unset) and "builtin/latest".

methods.name: getLabelDetectionMode
methods.description:
What labels should be detected with LABEL_DETECTION, in addition to video-level labels or segment-level labels.

If unspecified, defaults to SHOT_MODE.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.videointelligence.v1beta2.LabelDetectionMode label_detection_mode = 1;

methods.name: getStationaryCamera
methods.description:
Whether the video has been shot from a stationary (i.e. non-moving) camera.

When set to true, might improve detection accuracy for moving objects. Should be used with SHOT_AND_FRAME_MODE enabled.
